"What's the matter?": "These are fine pelts. Thank you very much!"
"Tulli is great at gathering food supplies and pelts like these."
"Actually, I was just about done remaking Taivas' weather equipment."
"I wasn't sure if I'd have enough materials, but with these I'll have more than enough."
"...And well, I'm sure you know where this is going..."
"Could you deliver this equipment to Taivas when it's finished?"
"I have a huge schedule of things to do after this, so I won't be able to deliver it myself, you see..."
"Hold on, let me finish it up real quick."
"I think he's currently in Danan Snowfields. This is really appreciated."
